EmailTemplate.name: 17-GEPS-XLE-C0004O-Finance.Email 4_Banking case study
EmailTemplate.subject: Why does OpenStack makes sense for the global banking industry?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> OpenStack private cloud – the right solution for the banking industry Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Does a private cloud make sense? That’s the question many large enterprises are asking. For the banking industry, the answer to that question is definitely - yes!
Read our case study, “Centuries Young Bank readies for another century of progress <[[https://pages.nokia.com/8227.centuries.old.bank.V2.html?did=d000000000ah&utm_campaign=gamechanger&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email 4b-bankingcasestudy&utm_term=finance]]>,” for details on how an OpenStack private cloud met the challenges of the banking industry and changed the game for this large multinational bank.
I hope that you enjoy this case study! Michael Williams
Global Enterprise Marketing | Nokia Connect with us © 2018 Nokia.
